appsDir.description: Path to the directory where shell and microfrontends are stored (monorepo mode).

defaultShell.description: Name of the default shell application.

name.description: The import name used for the shared remote (e.g., 'shared' or 'core-ui').

eslintConfig.description: Path to a custom ESLint config to be used for generated projects.

prettierConfig.description: Path to a custom Prettier config to be used for generated projects.

defaultStyleFramework.description: Default CSS framework to use in generated microfrontends.

defaultUseSass.description: Whether Sass/SCSS should be included by default.

defaultRemotes.description: Map of remote names to environment variable names.
